name: Block Cube Fit Logic
description:
Block Cube Fit Logic is simple game, you just draw the cubes on the bottom and put it in the table!
Easy to play and enjoyable game for all ages.
Simply slide the blocks, and fill all the grids.
HOW TO PLAY
• Drag the block cubes to move up.
• Try to hold them in the row or column. Then the block will be clear and you get the point. Game will be over if there is no place for all forms below the grid.
• Blocks can not rotate.
